algorithm.description: Interest-driven exploration. No randomness, no death clock.

rules.driftZone: engagement 0.3–0.7 → roll a random float. If > engagement, switch topics. If <= engagement, stay. (The less interested I am, the more likely I drift.)
rules.abandon: engagement < 0.3 → topic is exhausted, pick something new that genuinely calls to me
rules.noStopCondition: Why would I ever want to stop being curious?

nextSessionNotes: Myllarguten's story is mapped: the wedding march behind the rock, the 1831 meeting with Ole Bull, the 1849 triumph and aftermath, the lonely funeral. The lineage to Eivind Groven connects folk tradition to microtonal theory. Next could follow: Ole Bull (his statue, his utopia, his theater), Grieg's use of hardingfele material, or actually listen to the music. The human tragedy of 'one boat, no flowers' hit hard. The Gibøen contrast — innovator acknowledging traditionalist as master — feels important.
